summary: The dark side and hypocrisy of provincial American life is seen through the eyes of five children as they grow to adulthood at the turn-of-the-century.
cast: Ann Sheridan|Robert Cummings|Ronald Reagan|Betty Field|Charles Coburn|Claude Rains|Judith Anderson|Nancy Coleman|Kaaren Verne|Maria Ouspenskaya|Harry Davenport|Ernest Cossart|Ilka Grüning|Pat Moriarity|Minor Watson|Ludwig Stössel|Erwin Kalser|Egon Brecher|Ann E. Todd|Scotty Beckett|Douglas Croft|Mary Thomas|Julie Warren|Mary Scott|Leah Baird|Walter Baldwin|Henry Blair|Joan Duvalle|Eden Gray|Ludwig Hardt|Herbert Heywood|Danny Jackson|Payne B. Johnson|Fred Kelsey|Hank Mann|Frank Mayo|Frank Milan|Jack Mower|Hattie Noel|Emory Parnell|Bertha Powell|Thomas W. Ross|Hermine Sterler|Elizabeth Valentine
title: Abismo de pasión
